#summary The Bo2 documents module builds a framework for the generation of business documents.

==Description==
The module defines the contract of an engine that creates business documents. 
The implementation of the engine is based on OdfToolkit.

==Libraries==
  * Bo2UtilsDoc
  * Bo2OdfToolkit

==Dependencies==
====Bo2 libraries====
  * Bo2Utils
  * Bo2Creation
====Third party libraries====
  * SLF4J
  * Apache commons beans
  * Javassist
